results.content: This course is awful. I just forwarded to see if this instructor will actually give the result, I expect but he did not the website does not refresh alone you have to refresh it and udemy do not refund such useless courses so for you to know read the following. Did you know that #udemy do not follow what I Thought they did: "We want you to be satisfied, so all the eligible courses purchased on Udemy can be refunded within 30 days. For whatever reason, if you are unhappy with a course, you can request a refund, provided the request meets the guidelines in our refund policy. Most refunds are returned via the original payment method.". I did not read their refund policy and come on who does that but when I did I knew that if you watch beyond the duration they specified which is not clear for me yet you will not be refunded. So, for my fellow connections I am sharing with you what happened with me so you can be aware of the situation and if I am mistaken please let me know.

results.content: This was a horrible course. It is not at all suitable for beginners, or anyone even with a basic knowledge. Because this course just teaches you to copy and paste and it doesn't teach you how things work. Like in the second lecture it doesn't even tell you how the html forums work. I highly recommend you to purchase some other course, I am going to refund this couse.
